data.name: Zooniverse Less Scrolling
data.description: A more compact layout to reduce the amount of scrolling up and down in project workflows on Zooniverse. Primarily aimed at the larger species option lists in the Snapshot Safari projects and the longer more detailed question tasks like Chimp&See. Task features: - Task & Tutorial bar removed, tutorial button now a side tab - Fixed size exemplar images, less position 'bounce' - Descriptive text hidden, reveal with mouse click - Less padding, less scrolling! - Footer bar hidden, most links available elsewhere List features: - Smaller margins, more space! - Single line options, neater lists! Also has an experimental portrait layout for tablet screens with larger fonts and button sizes. All feedback welcome.

data.name: StackOverflow Official dark theme Improved
data.description: StackOverflow released a new dark theme, but it is not dark at all and it has very low contrast ratio. This theme is trying to fix these problems.

data.name: Tumblr: Old / Custom Colors
data.description: Change the colors of your Tumblr dashboard! (Unlike XKit extensions, this loads instantly.)

user.name: BabblingFishes
user.about:
[UPDATE: Due to Stylish's frequent server issues, I am in the process of moving my userstyles to GreasyFork. I will not be returning to Stylish until the site issues are fixed.]

I'm a web developer with some visual/attention issues, so I end up coding little styles to get rid of things that make my life harder. Some of them have the side effect of being fun and aesthetically pleasing, too.

I try to make my code easy to read for both people and machines, so you can edit my styles to suit your needs. If you need help with something, or if one of my styles broke, you can ask me about it on my tumblr.

Also note: I don't frequent this site; I only post things here as a place to keep them, so I'll probably end up adding things that have been done before. Sorry about that.
